text: Natalka Volodymyrivna Sniadanko () is a Ukrainian writer, journalist, and translator. She translates texts from German and Polish into Ukrainian. In 2011, Natalka won the Joseph Conrad Korzeniowski Literary Prize in 2011. == References == Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian journalists Category:Ukrainian translators Category:1973 births
title: Natalka Sniadanko
